Rulings.Tengu:
●This is a Multi-Trigger Effect that is activated in a chain to the opponent’s Spell or Trap Card.
●You can activate “Inmato” when another Plant you control is targeted by a Continuous Spell / Trap Card that was previously activated.
●You cannot activate “Inmato” during the Damage Step.

Rulings.Base: 1. This is a Multi-Trigger Effect that is activated in a chain to the opponent's Spell or Trap Card.\n2. You can activate "Inmato" when another Plant you control is targeted by a Continuous Spell / Trap Card that was previously activated.\n3. You cannot activate "Inmato" during the Damage Step.
